title: Bourbon BBQ Pork Chops
instructions: Season pork chops with salt and pepper. Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Sear pork chops 3-4 minutes per side. Remove and set aside. Reduce heat to medium. Add bourbon to deglaze pan (careful of flame). Whisk in ketchup, brown sugar, Worcestershire, vinegar, garlic powder, and onion powder. Return pork chops to pan. Spoon sauce over chops. Cover and simmer 15-20 minutes until internal temp reaches 145Â°F.
